segments.text: I'm the Mortgage Advisor at this branch . You wanted a chat about housing loans ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've found a wonderful property I wish to buy . Unfortunately , I just don't have access to the cash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . It's a problem most of us face . May I ask what the purchase price is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 600,000 RIB . But I've already put down 200,000 RIB , which is my absolute limit , so I'm looking for a loan of 400,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , you've already made a large initial deposit ? That is good news . OK , let's have a look at your credit details and get this started .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I already have an account with you , so it should be pretty straight forward .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is good , it should speed things up nicely .
segments.speaker: S1
